name: Don't Grind
description:
Are you ready to save Narbana, Shlurp, Kutchup and 100's of their friends from the gruesome Grinder?

Tap, flick and bounce your way through this awesome action survival game with just one rule: Don't Grind!

Features:
• Collect 100's of cute, ridiculously named Grindables
• Hone your skills and compete for daily medals and challenges
• Compete with your friends and fight your way to the top of the leaderboard

Don't Grind!

Oh and don't forget to sing along:
I hope you don’t mind
I’m using all the happiness I can find
For me and you, all the things we could do
Don’t Grind me Away!

Protips:
Tap to Jump, Swipe to Move, Don't Grind

WiFi or cellular connection is required to play.
Optional in-app purchases available.
